name: Dave Filoni
info:
• 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1974-06-07
  • 出生地: Mt. Lebanon, Pennsylvania, United States
  • 职业: Animation director, animator, screenwriter, voice actor
detail: Dave Filoni (born June 7, 1974) is an American animation director, voice actor, writer, and animator. He is most known for his work on Avatar: The Last Airbender and Star Wars: The Clone Wars. He is also an executive producer on Star Wars Rebels for all seasons, and for the first 2 seasons he served as its supervising director. Justin Ridge succeeded him as supervising director in September 2016 when Filoni accepted a promotion to oversee all of Lucasfilm Animation projects.

works.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars Season 7 / 星球大战：克隆人战争 第七季
Star Wars Rebels (Season 4) / 星球大战：义军崛起 第四季
